name: Acquiescence
storyline:
Acquiescence is a 2D shooting platformer, set within a dark and somber world filled with blasphemous forces of evil. Can you escape this madness? Is this a dream or a doomed reality?

Wander through seven surreal nightmarish levels battling through strange lands

Jump, doge and platform your way around lethal traps sprawled across the worlds.

Blast, destroy and carve your way through hordes of vile enemies, unlocking unique weapons

Fight and defeat unique bosses

Blaze through uncharted terrains with amazing dark electronic background music

Will you pass through and get to the other side to know the full tale?

Welcome to insanity...
summary: Dive into a world of eldritch horrors, in this 2D side-scrolling shooting action platformer. Platform your way across surreal & mysterious terrains while blasting through a multitude of strange foes. Amazing background soundtracks to assist you in your journey.

videos.title: Acquiescence - A Dark Surreal Action Platformer
